p: Based on the α and φ values predicted above, we built an iterative model according to Eqs ( 8)–( 10). We substituted the previous day’s i( t), s( t), and r( t) into the model, used the predicted φ value to calculate daily_recover_num( t), and incorporated the predicted α values and daily_recover_num(t). Each time we incorporated a predicted value, we obtained the next day’s i( t), s( t), and r( t). Repetition for n values of α and daily_recover_num( t) led to a prediction of the infection cases ( i( t)) for the next n days.
